findings.title: RSML - Redundant SafeMath Library
findings.description: Using SafeMath library adds complexity, overhead, and increases gas consumption unnecessarily.

findings.title: IDI - Immutable Declaration Improvement
findings.description: Variables that only initialize in the constructor can be declared as immutable for optimization.

findings.title: L09 - Dead Code Elimination
findings.description: Dead code can make a contract more difficult to understand and maintain, increasing deployment and interaction costs.

findings.title: L16 - Validate Variable Setters
findings.description: Missing checks for zero values in user-supplied input variables can lead to problems during contract execution.
